main event: On 20 June 1955, several witnesses in Dallas, Texas observed unidentified flying objects that appeared metallic and were described as having various bright lights.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes according to some witnesses,One witness described the objects as being enormous and operating in complete silence,Multiple witnesses reported seeing the objects hover before accelerating rapidly,The objects displayed lights of different colors including red, white, and green,Reports include sketches drawn by witnesses depicting the flight paths and shapes of the objects.
witness description: Major D.S. Williamson, housewives, civil engineer, salesman, and a captain in the U.S. Marine Corps were among the witnesses.
